revised_title: The Influence of Stress and Strain on the Physical Properties of Matter: Part I - Moduli of Elasticity and Relations between Moduli of Elasticity, Thermal Capacity, and Other Physical Constants
tldr: The authors investigate the relationship between stress, strain, and the physical properties of matter, specifically focusing on the moduli of elasticity and thermal capacity. They find that the cube of Young's Modulus varies as the seventh power of the thermal capacity per unit volume.
